title: LF Diamond 5 + jg for tournament TOMORROW!! (4/6/16)
body:
eLysium eSports is looking for a jungler to fill in for an online tournament from 12 noon - 6pm.

add me!

IGN: Hyper bluz0r

replies.body:
I would love to play in it i think i would do really well and work well with everyone :P
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}  PLX
